selectors
Class selectableFonts

java.lang.Object
  selectors.selectableFonts

public class selectableFonts
extends java.lang.Object

The selectable fonts to be used in the program Wraps them all up into one class to be called when necessary

Version:
1.3
Author:
Anthony Scata
